name: Salomon Shift Pro 100 AT Ski Boots - Men's
description: Power and stability meet versatility, these boots shift from in bounds groomers to backcountry tours with ease. The highly customizable Custom Shell HD and liner can be thermo-moulded to fit your foot perfectly. The GripWalk® soles and Surelock mechanism provide traction and range of motion when in walk mode.Polyurethane shell with fibreglass framing transfers power efficiently to your ski.Coreframe and Sensifit™ inserts add power and easy step-in.Cuff is Polyolefin and polyamide for stability and ideal flex.Shell and seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.35 mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.GripWalk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Compatible with tech bindings, WTR bindings, GripWalk bindings and MNC bindings.
